channel.title: Chicken on Tiny Tavern
channel.description: Recent content in Chicken on Tiny Tavern

item.title: Grilled Chicken Panini
item.description: This delicious panini is made with tender chicken breast, sweet corn, green peppers, and cheddar cheese sandwiched between two slices of multigrain bread.

item.title: Homemade Chicken Burger
item.description: This tender patty is made in-house and seasoned to perfection. It sits between two toasted brioche buns and is completed with lettuce, coleslaw, tomato, pickles, cheese, pineapple, and a secret sauce

item.title: TT's Signature Chicken Burger
item.description: This tender patty is made in-house and seasoned to perfection. It sits between two toasted brioche buns and is completed with lettuce, coleslaw, tomato, pickles, cheddar cheese, pineapple, jalape√±o, chili pepper, turkey bacon, caramelized onions, bacon jam and a secret sauce.
